pages.text: The Vacuumulator is a device that can pick up items in its area of effect. It can pick up EXP orbs when a $(l:thermal:technology/augments/xp_storage)knowledge concentrator augment$(/l) is installed. At base, the vacuumulator collects in a 9x9x9 area centered on it, which can be augmented up to 15x15x15 using $(l:thermal:technology/augments/area_radius)radial enhancement augments$(/l).

pages.title: Vacuumulator
pages.text: When controlled by redstone, the vacuumulator will immediately pick items up the moment it is turned on. This way, it will always reliably activate when pulsed.
